      • ErrorNumberText

        public static java.lang.String ErrorNumberText(int errno)
        Gets a text description of an error number.
        Parameters:
        errno - The error number from one of the other API calls
        Returns:
        The text description

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • Connect

        public boolean Connect(int frameRate)
        Start a new camera session with the specified frame rate.
        Parameters:
        frameRate - =4 for 30 fps, =3 for 15, =2 for 7.5 pfs
        Returns:
        True if success, false otherwise

      • NextFrame

        public boolean NextFrame(byte[] pixels)
        Gets one frame from the Chameleon3 or FireFly camera.
        Parameters:
        pixels - Fills this array with pixels in Bayer8 encoding
        Returns:
        True if success, false otherwise

      • Finish

        public void Finish()
        Terminate the session. Required by Flir/Pt.Grey drivers to prevent memory leaks.

      • Dimz

        public int Dimz()
        Gets the image size (rows and columns) for this camera.
        Returns:
        The number of pixel rows in the high 16, columns in low 16

      • PixTile

        public int PixTile()
        Gets the Bayer8 encoding number for this camera.
        Returns:
        The Bayer8 encoding number 1 (RG/GB) to 4

      • Live

        public boolean Live()
        Tells if this camera is live or not.
        Returns:
        true if this camera is connected, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
